originalText.text: Took out a VERY small loan a decade ago. Due to unexpected circumstances I fell behind and my account went into collections. I worked out a deal with the collections agency and thought all was well. Here I am a decade later and collectors are calling me, emailing, texting me DAILY. Seriously?

I worked out a deal with the collections agency and thought all was well. Here I am a decade later and collectors are calling me, emailing, texting me DAILY. Seriously?

originalText.text: The process of getting a loan quickly was when my company needed it, was a great experience. I worked with my account manager John Harrison to get the loan setup and funded quickly. John was excellent and so helpful I really appreciate his assistance. If you need a loan quickly, call John! He's the best!

John was excellent and so helpful I really appreciate his assistance. If you need a loan quickly, call John! He's the best!

originalText.text: Very poorly run, smoke and mirrors—definitely NOT up to American Express standards. I have had nothing but bad experiences with Kabbage. While a few representatives were good on the phone, some are utterly terrible, and that's when you can actually reach them. Kabbage sent an email that say to call a number if you didn't receive your card, but when I called, it's not even the right number to call, no option to press if you didn't receive a card. Just a lot of options to wade through that all tell you to go online. When I finally got in touch with them, they told me the card was coming by FedEx but couldn't provide tracking. It eventually arrived by US mail. They don't know what they're doing or talking about.  Later, I deposited a check for $10,000 and days later it still wasn't credited—it just vanished, no notice there was an issue, nothing. Endless waiting on hold to get an unsatisfactory explanation.

originalText.text: John Harrison is my account manager and has made my journey through this funding process easier: John calls me back any time he see missed call from me, or with a voice message requesting answer to an urgent question. He represents kabbage with such ease of perfection and professionalism. When John cannot assist me, he connects me immediately to someone that can help. I really do appreciate his help.
